content: this pattern was supposed to be called something else something very obvious and i was so overworked at the time that i completely forgot about the plan and just groped for a piece of the phonetic alphabet i hadn t used yet so it may change up soon but it will be the same shawl enjoy this simple top-down shawl with eyelets this design starts from a plain cast-on for a smooth minimalist edge rather than a traditional garter-stitch tab the fabric is dominated by garter stitch so it s fairly reversible as well the right side is determined by the stockinette spine and stockinette-column selvedges **materials ** * one skein or about 440 yards of malabrigo yarn sock * 1 24-48 circular needle in us4-6/3 25-4 0mm or size needed for gauge * tapestry needle * 1 2 25mm crochet hook for cast on * removable stitch marker **gauge ** gauge is 20 sts and 40 row over 4 /10cm of blocked garter stitch worked flat please be sure to check your gauge especially if you re working this as a one-skein project it cuts pretty close this free pattern is brought to you by the patreon page supporters 1 1 https //www patreon com/mousearmy
